model

Class PredictionModelUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.PredictionModelUtil

  • public class PredictionModelUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used for PredictionModel. It is used to store data that is needed in order to detect if events occur. Each instance is used to store data for one possible predicted event. It's used in the second stage of the prediction algorithm
    Author:
    Craig

      • PredictionModelUtil

        public PredictionModelUtil(int index,
                           double spike,
                           double avgBefore,
                           double maxBefore,
                           java.lang.String time)
        Create a new PredictorUtil object
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the runnerNames collect (in PredictionModel) that the name of the runner is in
        spike - The spike value
        avgBefore - The average value before the spike
        maxBefore - The maximum value that was before the spike
        time - Time of the spike
